name: Joyce
line: Let me out of here! Somebody, please! Let me out!

name: Dr. Brenner
line: Your son. We know you've been in contact with him.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: When and how did you make contact with him?

name: Dr. Brenner
line: Six. Six people have been taken this week. This... thing that took your son... we don't really understand it. But its behavior is predictable. Like all animals... it eats. It will take more sons. More daughters. I want to save them. I want to save your son. But I can't do that. Not without your help.

name: Joyce
line: Stop. I know who you are. I know what you've done. You took my boy away from me! You left him in that place to die! You faked his death! We had a funeral. We buried him. And now you're asking for my help? Go to hell.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: Okay, now what do you know?

name: Joyce
line: I know you do experiments on kidnapped little kids, whose parents' brains you've turned to mush. And I know you went a little too far this time and you messed up in a big way. I mean, you really messed up, didn't you? Big time. That's why you're trying to cover your tracks. You killed Benny Hammond, you faked Will Byers' death. You made it look like that little girl just ran away. See, I told you. I know everything.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: All right, who are you working with?

name: Joyce
line: Nobody. But I did give all this over to my friend at the Times. He's gonna blow this thing wide open.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: You're just a junkie. A small town cop who had a really bad week. Took one too many pills this time. You made a mistake coming back here.

name: Hopper
line: No, I didn't. Here's what's gonna happen. You're gonna let me and Joyce Byers go... you're gonna give us anything we need, and we're gonna find her son. And then we're gonna forget that any of this ever happened.

name: Dustin
line: Nancy and Jonathan. His car's gone.

name: Lucas
line: They're probably just sucking face somewhere.

name: Mike
line: Did they go with the chief?

name: Lucas
line: What? Did you see them? Do you know where they went?

name: Hopper
line: Where's the girl? You gotta give me your word. Nobody's ever gonna find out about this. And those other three kids, those boys, you're gonna leave them alone. Then I'll tell you. Tell you where your little science experiment is.

name: Hopper
line: Look, everything that's happened here and everything that's gonna happen, we don't talk about. You want Will back? This place had nothing to do with it. That's the deal. You got it?

name: Joyce
line: But my son's in there. He...

name: Connie
line: I'm telling you, this is a mistake.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: It's gone. Isn't that what you wanted?

name: Connie
line: And if they find the boy?

name: Hopper
line: I need you to relax, okay? I want you to slow down your breathing, take deep breaths. In and out. Deep breath in... and out. In and out.

name: Hopper
line: Roasted princess with paprika and gravy!

name: Hopper
line: Whoa, hey! Hey. You all right?

name: Joyce
line: I don't know. I don't know.

name: Hopper
line: Hey, you all right? Whoa, whoa, whoa. Relax, relax. Honey, honey. Honey, just breathe. Breathe, breathe, breathe. In and out. Slow, slow, slow. In and out with me. In... You okay?

name: Jonathan
line: Wait for the yo-yo to move.

name: Nancy
line: You don't have to do this...

name: Nancy
line: I'm just saying, you don't have to...

name: Mike
line: Guys, guys! This is crazy. We can't just wait around.

name: Lucas
line: Mike, in case you forgot, we're still fugitives. The bad men are still looking for us.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, and we don't even know where your sister is.

name: Lucas
line: I still think we should stick to the chief's plan.

name: Dustin
line: Exactly. We stay here, keep El out of sight and keep her safe. That's the most important thing, remember? Besides, she's okay. She's with Jonathan.

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, and she's kind of a badass now, so...

name: Mike
line: Well, where are you going? You just said stick to the plan!

name: Dustin
line: I am. I'm just gonna go get some chocolate pudding. I'm telling you, Lunch Lady Phyllis hoards that shit.

name: Dustin
line: It's just the wind. Don't worry. My mom, she said the lights speak when it comes.

name: Dustin
line: Blink. Think of them as alarms.

name: Steve
line: Jonathan? Are you there, man? It's... it's Steve! Listen, I just want to talk!

name: Steve
line: I'm not trying to start anything, okay?

name: Nancy
line: I don't care about that. You need to leave.

name: Steve
line: No, no, no. Listen, I messed up, okay? I messed... I messed up. Okay? Really. Please. I just want to make things right. Okay? Please. Please... Hey, what happened to your hand? Is that blood?

name: Steve
line: Wait a sec. Did he do this to you?

name: Nancy
line: No. No! No, Steve! What is... What the...

name: Nancy
line: You need to get out of here.

name: Steve
line: Whoa. What is all... What is that smell? Is that... is that gasoline?

name: Steve
line: Wait. What? What is going on? Okay, is this a joke? Stop. Put the gun down.

name: Steve
line: Nancy. Wait. Is this a... What is this?

name: Steve
line: Where is what? Whoa! Easy with that!

name: Jonathan
line: I don't know. I don't see it.

name: Steve
line: Where is what? Hello? Will someone please explain to me what the hell is going...

name: Jonathan
line: No! Go! Go! Run! Go! Get out of here!

name: Steve
line: Jump! Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Jesus! Jesus! What the hell was that? What the hell was that?

name: Jonathan
line: I don't know. Do you hear anything?

name: Hopper
line: I asked Mrs. Spencer what made them red and she said she didn't know and for pity's sake not to ask her any more questions. She said I must have asked her a thousand already. I suppose I had, too, but how are you gonna find things out if you don't ask questions? And what does make roads red? 'Well, I don't know,' said Matthew. It just makes me feel glad to be alive... it's such an interesting world.

name: Steve
line: This is crazy. This is crazy. This is crazy. This is crazy! This is crazy! This is crazy!

name: Nancy
line: What are you do... What are you doing? Are you insane?

name: Nancy
line: So you need to leave. Right now. Where is it?

name: Jonathan
line: Come on. Come on, you son of a bitch.

name: Jonathan
line: No. Where... Come on. Where are you? Come on!

name: Nancy
line: Jonathan! Go to hell, you son of a bitch!

name: Jonathan
line: He's in the trap! He's stuck!

name: Jonathan
line: No. It has to be dead.

name: Hopper
line: I don't think that's the monster.

name: Dustin
line: Found it! I knew she was hoarding it. I knew it. Always lying, saying she's out. Bald-faced liar. Mike, I found the chocolate pudding!

name: Mike
line: Okay! Are you feeling any better?

name: Mike
line: Pudding, it's... it's this chocolate goo you eat with a spoon. Don't worry, when all this is over, you won't have to keep eating junk food and leftovers like a dog anymore. My mom, she's a pretty awesome cook. She can make you whatever you like.

name: Mike
line: Well, yeah, Eggos, but real food, too. See, I was thinking, once all this is over and Will's back and you're not a secret anymore, my parents can get you an actual bed for the basement. Or you can take my room if you want, since I'm down there all the time anyways. My point is, they'll take care of you. They'll be like your new parents, and Nancy, she'll be like your new sister.

name: Eleven
line: Will you be like my brother?

name: Mike
line: I mean, I don't know, I guess it's not. It's stupid.

name: Mike
line: Well... I was thinking... I don't know... maybe we can go to the Snow Ball together.

name: Mike
line: It's this cheesy school dance, where you go in the gym and dance to music and stuff. I've never been, but I know you're not supposed to go with your sister.

name: Mike
line: I mean... you can, but it'd be really weird. You go to school dances with someone that, you know... someone that you like.

name: Mike
line: Not a friend. Uh... uh... Uh, someone like a... Nancy. Hold on, I'll be right back.

name: Agent
line: We know they're here. Be advised, west side of the building is clear. Sir, we've searched everywhere. There's no sign of them. Nothin'. Keep it locked down. All right. Kitchen.

name: Mike
line: I don't know, but they knew we were in the gym.

name: Mike
line: Back! Go back! Go, go! Go left!

name: Mike
line: No, no, no, she won't wake up. El! El!

name: Mike
line: No! You want her, you have to kill us first.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: Eleven? Eleven, can you hear me? Eleven?

name: Dr. Brenner
line: Yes, yes, it's your papa. I'm here now. Shh, shh, you're sick. You're sick, but I'm going to make you better. I'm going to take you back home, where I can make you well again. Where we can make all of this better, so no one else gets hurt.

name: Mike
line: Go, go, go, go, go! Come on, come on.

name: Joyce
line: Will! Will! Will! Oh, my God! Will! Hopper! Oh, my God! You need to help get him out! Get him out!

name: Mike
line: Come on, come on! Sorry. Hold on, we're almost there. We're almost there. Come on. Help, help. Come on, get her on the table. Just hold on a little longer, okay? He's gone. The bad man's gone. We'll be home soon, and my mom... she'll get you your own bed. You can eat as many Eggos as you want. And we can go to the Snow Ball.

name: Dustin
line: Get the wrist rocket! Get the wrist rocket now! Take it out now!

name: Lucas
line: Get the rocks, get the rocks, get the rocks!

name: Mike
line: Go! Go! Kill it! Kill it!

name: Lucas
line: Fire! Fire! Give me another one.

name: Mike
line: Kill it! Go, go, go, go!

name: Dustin
line: Kill it! Bastard! Kill it now!

name: Mike
line: Get, get, get... Come on, kill the bastard!

name: Dustin
line: Get, get, get... Come on! Go, go, go!

name: Mike
line: El? El? El! El, where are you? Eleven! El?

name: Joyce
line: He's not breathing, he's not breathing.

name: Hopper
line: All right, Joyce, Joyce, listen to me, listen to me, listen to me. I need you to tilt his head back...

name: Hopper
line: One, two, three, four. Now when I tell you, you're gonna pinch his nostrils, and breathe into his mouth... twice.

name: Hopper
line: One second... then pause. 22, 23. Then one second.

name: Hopper
line: Come on... Come on, kid. Come on, kid!

name: Joyce
line: Will! Will, listen to me. It's me, it's your mom and I love you so much. I love you so much. I love you more than anything in the world. Please...

name: Nurse
line: Blood pressure keeps dropping. Her pulse ox is falling.

name: Joyce
line: I love you so much. I love you more than anything in the world. Please, please come back to me. Just... Please, please wake up. Please, please. Breathe, Will, come on! Come back to me, breathe. I need you to wake up now. I need you to breathe. Please breathe! Please! That's it. Oh, my God, that's it, that's it. That's it, baby. Breathe. Breathe. All right. Come on. Come on. Breathe, breathe, come on, come on. Good, good, good, good. Just breathe, Will, breathe.

name: Karen
line: Michael? Michael! Michael? Oh, my God. Oh, my God. You're okay. You're okay.

name: Jonathan
line: You're home. You're home now. You're safe.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, it's me, buddy. We missed you. We really missed you.

name: Jonathan
line: What, this? It's just a cut. It's nothing. You're worried about my hand. Oh, hey, uh... We, uh... We brought you some stuff... so you don't get bored in here. So... Uh, I made you a new mix tape. There's some stuff on there I think you really might like.

name: Mike
line: Guys. Guys, he's up. Will is up. Guys, Will's up. Guys, come on. Byers!

name: Joyce
line: Be careful. Be careful with him.

name: Dustin
line: You won't believe what happened when you were gone, man. It was mental.

name: Lucas
line: In front of the whole school! Yes!

name: Mike
line: We made a new friend. She stopped it. She saved us. But she's gone now.

name: Lucas
line: Well, we call her 'El' for short.

name: Dustin
line: She flipped a van with her mind, and these agents were trying to shoot us...

name: Lucas
line: Then she squeezed the brains out...

name: Dustin
line: And blood was pouring out of their faces.

name: Mike
line: It was pouring out of their eyes.

name: Lucas
line: Agents just started grabbing us and stuff...

name: Mike
line: Something is coming. Something angry. Hungry for your blood. It is almost here.

name: Dustin
line: It's the thessalhydra, I'm telling you.

name: Dustin
line: I'm telling you, it's the thessalhydra. The thessalhydra!

name: Mike
line: It roars in anger! Will, your action!

name: Dustin
line: Fireball the son of a bitch.

name: Mike
line: Direct hit. Will the Wise's fireball hits the thessalhydra. It makes a painful... and then... it crumbles to the ground. Its clawed hand reaches for you one last time and, and, and... and...

name: Lucas
line: Lucas cuts off its seven heads,

name: Dustin
line: and Dustin places them into his bag of holding.

name: Mike
line: You carry the heads out of the dungeon, victorious, and you present them to King Tristan. He thanks you for your bravery and service.

name: Dustin
line: Whoa. Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, that's not it, is it?

name: Dustin
line: Oh, a medal ceremony? What are you talking about?

name: Lucas
line: The campaign was way too short.

name: Lucas
line: But it doesn't make any sense.

name: Lucas
line: Uh, no, what about the lost knight? And the proud princess? And those weird flowers in the cave?

name: Jonathan
line: Jeez, what's that smell? Have you guys been playing games all day, or just farting?

name: Lucas
line: Oh, that's just Dustin. He farted. Dustin farted.

name: Dustin
line: No, you stop. No, you stop. Yeah, scream! You're like a little girl.

name: Karen
line: Hi. Wish your mom a Merry Christmas for me, okay?

name: Will
line: Yeah, thank you. Uh, Merry Christmas.

name: Mike
line: Hey, Jonathan, wait up. Merry Christmas.

name: Jonathan
line: Thanks, um... I... I didn't get you anything. I... I feel bad.

name: Mike
line: No. No, it's, uh, it's not really a present. It's, um... Well, you'll see.

name: Jonathan
line: Merry Christmas. You ready? Let's go.

name: Karen
line: Did you give it to him?

name: Hopper
line: Oh, come on, you think I actually wanted to come to this thing? I was just hungry.

name: Hopper
line: Well, your wife doesn't have time to cook for me, you know what I'm saying?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah. Looks pretty big. Be careful. You'll break it.

name: Will
line: What are you... What are you doing?

name: Joyce
line: It looks great. Oh, this is just so overcooked. And look, the potatoes are runny.

name: Will
line: The green present. It's an Atari. I felt Dustin's today, it's the same exact weight.

name: Jonathan
line: Really? Well... We'll have to see, won't we? Hey, no more snooping.

name: Will
line: No, I forgot to wash my hands. I'll be right back.

name: Jonathan
line: Okay. He's washing his hands? Thanks.

name: Jonathan
line: Mmm. Very good, Mom. Mmm. Hey, Mom. Did Will tell you about, uh, the game?

name: Will
line: No. What game? I threw a fireball at him and... dead.
